attributes.action: Make Social Services Child Department Work Weekends
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We all know about the incompetency of social services with reports in the media from the past few years. But I was horrified as I recently discovered they DO NOT work weekends.
Now how many parents have seperated in the country I know that people (parents and children) would benefit from weekend visits or appointments. Even if it was just a skeleton staff on call. Childrens lives could be saved.
In a country where supermarkets are open 24 hours and weekends why can't an agency that is suppossed to safeguard the future of our country do the same?
